query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS paradoxes (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,
  paradoxStatement TEXT NOT NULL,
  themeId VARCHAR(128),
  teacherPerspectives JSON,
  isActive BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_paradox_reflections (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  paradoxId INT NOT NULL,
  userReflection TEXT NOT NULL,
  aiResponse TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (paradoxId) REFERENCES paradoxes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS paradoxes (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,
  paradoxStatement TEXT NOT NULL,
  themeId VARCHAR(128),
  teacherPerspectives JSON,
  isActive BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_paradox_reflections (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  paradoxId INT NOT NULL,
  userReflection TEXT NOT NULL,
  aiResponse TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (paradoxId) REFERENCES paradoxes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
